short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On every user page, show the number of base games the user has instead of the number of base games plus expansions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This alters the "Collection Summary" on every user page on BGG to change "Board Game" to "Board Game Base" and correctly displays the number of base games in this section of the collection instead of displaying the number of base games plus expansions (which is the BGG default).
